Name: Move-SmbClient
Synopsis: Requests an SMB client to move the associated SMB connection to a specified cluster node.

Name: Get-SmbWitnessClient
Synopsis: Retrieves information about the SMB clients connected to the SMB witness servers in a cluster.

Name: Move-SmbWitnessClient
Synopsis: Requests an SMB client to move the associated SMB connection to a specified cluster node.
